name: Hooks Recoded
description:
A very short, fast paced platforming game about grappling hooks
Use your grappling hook to find your way to the end of each level, using two main forms of transport to get there, spinning around the hooks and going directly through them.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

I was the lead developer on the original hooks, which hopefully you've never heard of, but it's here if you're interested: https://hooksgame.itch.io/hooks-game.
In the time that's been released, I've been working on a few other games, but always come back to this in my free time. So, I made this. A school project with just a little bit more polish.

An entirely recoded hooks, from the ground up. Everything from controls to physics calculations has been rewritten to be smoother and just significantly less broken.
